item.description:
We'll gather at Gloria's home in Windsor for a potluck dinner with a green food theme in honor of St. Patrick's Day.  When you RSVP, please say what you are bringing, so we don't just have green salads with green goddess dressing, okay!  Anyway, we know you can be more creative than that!

Once we have all turned into certified greentooths (if you don't know what a greentooth is, just know that it's worse than a redneck!), we'll take some time to review this year's scholarship applications and select our winner.

And just so no one dawdles with the scholarship applications, fun and board games to follow.  Bring your favorite game or Gloria's household has a few that usually lead to laughing so hard the line for the bathroom becomes frantic.

Since it's in a private home, address and directions will only be sent to those who RSVP. 

Hope to see you there!
item.name: Green food, games, and scholarships
